headline: Woman arrested after knife incident in Youngstown
author: Jonathan Renforth
sentences: YOUNGSTOWN, Ohio (WKBN)- A woman is in custody after police said that a man was cut by a knife in Youngstown Tuesday morning.
Police tell us itâ€™s a case of domestic violence and that the man was taken to the hospital.
It happened on the East Side around 3 a.m. on the 1400 block of Atkinson Avenue.
Police said that the man should be ok.
